title: Deadpool The Game Direct PC Game
description:
Deadpool is an action-packed video game with a third-person shooter and action hack slash. The gameplay is all about fighting enemies using guns and other melee weapons. The arms and ammunition will become more advanced as you progress through the story and earn points to upgrade. Steep
At frequent intervals, the game breaks the fourth wall by allowing Deadpool to have verbal interaction with the player. This of course is based on progress and skill. Deadpool is by default armed with swords and guns. He also has the access to plasma guns, giant hammers, and a variety of other weapons in the game.
You will be delighted to know that short teleportation moves are possible as well. When Deadpool falls apart and sustains the damage, the players must be careful to avoid any further damage. This will allow time to recover. Deadpool can eliminate enemies silently with guns, weapons, or stealth kills.

system_requirements.OS: Windows 10, Windows 8, Windows 7, Windows Vista, Windows XP
system_requirements.Graphics: GeForce 8800 GT or ATI Radeon HD4850
